name: Snap
title: snap.com
shortDescription: Snap Inc. is a technology company that leverages the camera to enhance communication and expression. Targeted at a diverse audience, including designers, engineers, and everyday users, Snap allows individuals to create their Bitmoji and interact funnily and safely. An example use case is using Snap's AR capabilities to engage with friends in a virtual space, enhancing social interactions with creative and interactive elements.
